amendment.description: To set aside a reserve fund for possible military action and reconstruction in Iraq.

action.text: Motion by Senator Frist to reconsider the vote (Roll Call No. 67) by which amendment SA 270 was agreed to was withdrawn in Senate.
Motion by Senator Frist to reconsider the vote (Roll Call No. 67) by which amendment SA 270 was agreed to entered in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 270 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 67.

action.text: Amendment SA 270 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S4071-4075; text: CR S4071-4072) To set aside a reserve fund for possible military action and reconstruction in Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 270 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 67.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 270 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 67.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 270 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Feingold.
